body.content:
Attn: Dear Beneficiary
 
 
 
 
 
Have you received your payment which was scheduled to be remitted to you on 06-01-2021? You have to confirm back to me immediately.
 
 
 
If you have been fully paid and compensated, kindly specify the following below:
 
 
 
FULL NAME:
AMOUNT TRANSFERRED:
AMOUNT EXPECTING:
DIRECT MOBILE NUMBER:
 
 
 
I will be waiting to hear from you immediately.
 
 
 
 
Thanks.
Mr. Morrison Green,
Funds Investigator.

header.subject: Attn:. Confirm If You Have Received Your Funds.
